title: Classifying Supernova #1
content: You can determine the type of supernova by overlaying supernovae light curve templates. Try this out by selecting a template from the dropdown menu. Then drag the light curve template over your light curve graph to try to match it to your data points. Try a different template. Repeat this process until you find the template that best fits your data.
